page.title: 06Recreation in Brafferton
page.content:
The only centre for recreation in Brafferton is the{Village Hall.}This was built in 1977 using stone from an old barn in an estate at nearby Coatham Mundeville.
{The activities}which take place in the hall include:- Toddlers Group Keep Fit Carpet Bowls Sequence Dancing Youth Club
The Village Hall is run by a committee from the{Village Hall {Association}and financed by a small subscription (50 pence for each adult ) from each household.
However the activities seem to involve mainly the newer residents.
